com.here.android.mpa.ar

Class ARIconObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.ar.ARObject
      • com.here.android.mpa.ar.ARIconObject

  • public final class ARIconObject
extends ARObject
    Concrete ARObject which represents the LiveSight object model. Composed of FRONT, DOWN and BACK icons, an info icon and a GeoCoordinate representing the objects position.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.here.android.mpa.ar.ARObject

      • ARIconObject

        public ARIconObject(GeoCoordinate coordinate,
                    android.graphics.Bitmap info)
        Construct the object using specified Image
        Parameters:
        coordinate - A GeoCoordinate representing coordinates of the AR icon
        info - A Bitmap of info in AR view

      • ARIconObject

        public ARIconObject(GeoCoordinate coordinate,
                    android.graphics.Bitmap info,
                    Image icon)
        Construct the object using specified Image
        Parameters:
        coordinate - A GeoCoordinate representing coordinates of the AR icon
        info - A Bitmap of info in AR view
        icon - Image representing image to be used for FRONT, DOWN and BACK icons

      • ARIconObject

        public ARIconObject(GeoCoordinate coordinate,
                    android.graphics.Bitmap info,
                    int iconResourceId)
        Construct the object using provided image resource id. Falls back to default images if resource id is invalid.
        Parameters:
        coordinate - A GeoCoordinate representing coordinates of the AR icon
        info - A Bitmap of info in AR view
        iconResourceId - Representing image resource id to be used for FRONT, DOWN and BACK icons

      • ARIconObject

        public ARIconObject(GeoCoordinate coordinate,
                    android.graphics.Bitmap info,
                    Image frontIcon,
                    Image downIcon,
                    Image backIcon)
        Construct the object using specified FRONT, DOWN and BACK Images
        Parameters:
        coordinate - A GeoCoordinate representing coordinates of the AR icon
        info - A Bitmap of info in AR view
        frontIcon - Image representing image to be used for both FRONT icon
        downIcon - Image representing image to be used for both DOWN icon
        backIcon - Image representing image to be used for both BACK icon

      • ARIconObject

        public ARIconObject(GeoCoordinate coordinate,
                    android.graphics.Bitmap info,
                    int frontIconResourceId,
                    int downIconResourceId,
                    int backIconResourceId)
        Construct the object using provided image resource ids for FRONT, DOWN and BACK icons. Falls back to default images if either of the icons resources are not valid.
        Parameters:
        coordinate - A GeoCoordinate representing coordinates of the AR icon
        info - A Bitmap of info in AR view
        frontIconResourceId - Representing FRONT image resource id to be used for FRONT icon
        downIconResourceId - Representing DOWN image resource id to be used for DOWN icon
        backIconResourceId - Representing BACK image resource id to be used for BACK icon

      • ARIconObject

        public ARIconObject(GeoCoordinate coordinate,
                    android.graphics.Bitmap info,
                    java.lang.String frontIconUrl,
                    java.lang.String downIconUrl,
                    java.lang.String backIconUrl)
        Construct the object using FRONT, DOWN and BACK icons URLs. If either of the URLs are invalid default icons will be used.
        Parameters:
        coordinate - A GeoCoordinate representing coordinates of the AR icon
        info - A Bitmap of info in AR view
        frontIconUrl - String representing URL of the FRONT icon
        downIconUrl - String representing URL of the DOWN icon
        backIconUrl - String representing URL of the BACK icon

      • ARIconObject

        public ARIconObject(GeoCoordinate coordinate,
                    android.view.View info)
        Construct the object using specified Image
        Parameters:
        coordinate - A GeoCoordinate representing coordinates of the AR icon
        info - A UI View of info in AR view

      • ARIconObject

        icon - Image representing image to be used for FRONT, DOWN and BACK icons

        public ARIconObject(GeoCoordinate coordinate,
                    android.view.View info,
                    int frontIconResourceId,
                    int downIconResourceId,
                    int backIconResourceId)
        Construct the object using provided image resource ids for FRONT, DOWN and BACK icons. Falls back to default images if either of the icons resources are not valid.
        Parameters:
        coordinate - A GeoCoordinate representing coordinates of the AR icon
        info - A UI View of info in AR view
        frontIconResourceId - Representing FRONT image resource id to be used for FRONT icon
        downIconResourceId - Representing DOWN image resource id to be used for DOWN icon
        backIconResourceId - Representing DOWN image resource id to be used for BACK icon

      • ARIconObject

        public ARIconObject(GeoCoordinate coordinate,
                    android.view.View info,
                    java.lang.String frontIconUrl,
                    java.lang.String downIconUrl,
                    java.lang.String backIconUrl)
        Construct the object using FRONT, DOWN and BACK icon URLs. If either of the URLs are invalid default icons will be used.
        Parameters:
        coordinate - A GeoCoordinate representing coordinates of the AR icon
        info - A UI View of info in AR view
        frontIconUrl - String representing URL of the FRONT icon
        downIconUrl - String representing URL of the DOWN icon
        backIconUrl - String representing URL of the BACK icon
